aboutMe: My journey in the technology field began as a support analyst. After several years in this profession and pursuing my degree in Systems Analyst, I became interested in software development. I transitioned into the software development area, taking courses to enhance my skills as a developer (Hard Skills) and improve my interpersonal skills (Soft Skills). In my free time, I enjoy reading, watching movies, studying astronomy, playing video games, and drawing.
analystJobTitle: Martucci Melillo — Support Analyst October 2018 - February 2021
analystJobDescription: My responsibilities included providing direct technical support to users, diagnosing and resolving a variety of issues on computers.
juniorJobTitle: Martucci Melillo — Junior Software Developer March 2021 - August 2023
juniorJobDescription: My journey began by developing some utility software to support operations. Initially, I created an electronic agenda using Next.js. As I gained more experience, I started working on the company's main system, which is a legal process control software developed in Delphi 7 and Firebird. Later on, I developed a comprehensive Help Desk system using Java, used to manage internal tickets.
juniorJobSkills: Technologies: Delphi 7, React Js, Java, Firebird
midJobTitle: Martucci Melillo — Software Developer Since September 2023 – Present
midJobDescription: As a mid level software developer, I have taken on various responsibilities, including the development and proposal of new solutions for the company. One of these solutions was the creation of a web module for judicial process consultation. To achieve this, I developed an application using Java 11 and Spring Boot for communication with Firebird and MySQL databases, implementing two-factor authentication. Additionally, I created a frontend with React.js and Material UI for visual interfaces. I was also tasked with developing a conditional interview system to assist in the company's internal procedures.
midJobSkills: Technologies: React, Java, Spring Boot, Mysql
